amendment.description: Amendment repeals a section of U.S. law that requires a report be made to Congress 15 days before any U.S. assistance can be obligated for Liberia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to remove Liberia from the list of countries prohibited from receiving funds for assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
